Package system

Class Database

java.lang.Object
system.Database
public class Database extends Object
Handles data storage and retrieval for the system, managing branches and user accounts.
Author:
FDAA 5

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Database()
    Constructs a new Database object, initializing lists for storing branches and user accounts.

  • Constructor Details

    • Database

      public Database()
      Constructs a new Database object, initializing lists for storing branches and user accounts.

  • Method Details

    • loadFiles

      public void loadFiles()
      Loads data from files into the system's branch and account lists. This method reads branches, accounts, and menu items from CSV files.

    • saveFiles

      public void saveFiles()
      Saves data from the system's lists to files. This method writes branches, accounts, and menu items to CSV files.

    • findBranch

      public static Branch findBranch(String branchName) throws BranchNotFoundException
      searches for a branch by its name
      Parameters:
      branchName - the name of the branch to be found
      Returns:
      the found branch object
      Throws:
      BranchNotFoundException - If no branch with the given name is found.

    • getBranchList

      public ArrayList<Branch> getBranchList()
      retireves the list of branches
      Returns:
      the branch list

    • getAccountList

      public ArrayList<User> getAccountList()
      retrieves the list of accounts
      Returns:
      the account list
